thread.title: Cubs win NL Division Series, beat Cardinals 6-4 in Game 4
thread.title_full: Cubs win NL Division Series, beat Cardinals 6-4 in Game 4

title: Cubs win NL Division Series, beat Cardinals 6-4 in Game 4
text:
> Sports Cubs win NL Division Series, beat Cardinals 6-4 in Game 4 Chicago Cubs relief pitcher Hector Rondon (56) celebrates after striking out St. Louis Cardinals left fielder Stephen Piscotty (55) to win Game 4 in baseball's National League Division Series, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Chicago. The Cubs won 4-6. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh)
